title.en: Merched y Wawr Gorseinon Branch visit the Assembly
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Cangen Gorseinon yn y Cynulliad

description.en:
Merched y Wawr Cangen Gorseinon yn mwynhau gwibdaith i'r Cynulliad gyda Dr Dai Lloyd 2010. Cefn: Megan Jones, Catrin Stevens, Jean Huxtable, Ann Easter, Helen Jenkins, Olive Lawlor, Eluned Evans, ? Eryl Fouracre-Jones; Shirley Best
Blaen: Betsy Davies, Alma John, Elizabeth Morgan, Janet Richards, Rahel Williams, Dr Dai Lloyd, AC,  Gwen Evans, Sue Leyshon, Ann Davies (trefnydd y daith), Janet Dicks, Bethan Edwards.
